history.title: Our History
history.heading: A Rich Heritage
history.intro: From its humble beginnings as a small farming community, Bar Elias has grown into a vibrant municipality.
history.paragraph1: In the early 19th century, the town became a key stop on regional trade routes, fostering cultural exchange and economic growth.
history.paragraph2: Today, we celebrate our diverse heritage and continue to build a prosperous future for all residents.

mission.title: Mission & Vision
mission.subtitle: Our guiding principles that shape every service we provide.
mission.missionText: To deliver transparent, efficient municipal services that enhance the quality of life in our community.
mission.visionText: To be a leading municipality known for innovation, sustainability, and community engagement.
